com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.history

Interface FlowEvent<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the event's serialised data (if it has any).
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    StepFailedEvent<T>, StepStartedEvent<T>, StepSucceededEvent<T>

    public interface FlowEvent<T>
    An event that has occurred during flow execution.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UUID getFlowId()
      Get the id of the flow in which the event occurred.
      UUID getStepId()
      Get the id of the flow step in which the event occurred.
      long getTimestamp()
      Get the timestamp (milliseconds since epoch) of the flow event.
      <V> V translate(FlowEventTranslator<T,V> translator)
      Translate this event to some other type using the provided event translator.

    • Method Detail

      • getFlowId

        UUID getFlowId()
        Get the id of the flow in which the event occurred.
        Returns:
        The id of the flow in which the event occurred.

      • getStepId

        UUID getStepId()
        Get the id of the flow step in which the event occurred.
        Returns:
        The id of the flow step in which the event occurred.

      • getTimestamp

        long getTimestamp()
        Get the timestamp (milliseconds since epoch) of the flow event.
        Returns:
        The timestamp (milliseconds since epoch) of the flow event.

      • translate

        <V> V translate(FlowEventTranslator<T,V> translator)
        Translate this event to some other type using the provided event translator.
        Type Parameters:
        V - The target type of translation.
        Parameters:
        translator - The translator to use to translate this event.
        Returns:
        The translated event.
